title: Once the development of AH/R&R tenements is completed and Occupation Certificate is granted, it shall be the responsibility of the MCGM/Public Authority of allotment of AH/R&R tenements within 12 months from the date of grant of occupation or earlier
clause_text: Once the development of AH/R&R tenements is completed and Occupation Certificate is granted, it shall be the responsibility of the MCGM/Public Authority of allotment of AH/R&R tenements within 12 months from the date of grant of occupation or earlier. Once development proposal is approved for AH/R&R, the MCGM/Public Authority may start process of sale proceeds.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Once the development of AH/R&R tenements is completed and Occupation Certificate is granted, it shall be the responsibility of the MCGM/Public Authority of allotment of AH/R&R tenements within 12 mont
